content: simple ribbed hat by jocelyn frasier version 2 1 this simple ribbed hat is the perfect choice for those who are hard to find gifts for this ribbed hat will stretch and contract to fit a range of head adult head sizes which makes it perfect for gifted to friends and family this hat is also reversible pattern information this hat is worked in the round from the crown to brim in a 2x3 ribbed step 1 create a small circle with your yarn keep the tail to the right and on top of the circle step 2 take your needle and insert it into the circle from back to front keep the yarn tail on top of the circle and behind the needle pinch the yarn loop tight around the needle step 3 yarn over step 4 insert needle into loop and bring up a stitch repeat steps 3 & 4 until you have the correct number
